# tintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to the bar button items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tintColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

In iOS 7 and later, all subclasses of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] derive their behavior for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] from the base class. See the discussion of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] at the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] level for more information.
title: tintColor
